title: Cryptographic Algorithm Family Definitions
description: Enumerates cryptographic algorithm families and their specific metadata.

lastUpdated.title: Last Updated
lastUpdated.description: The date and time (timestamp) when the data was last updated.

algorithms.title: Algorithm Families
algorithms.description: An array of cryptographic algorithm family definitions.

items.title: Algorithm Family
items.description: Defines a cryptographic algorithm family and its metadata.

family.title: Algorithm Family
family.description: The name of the cryptographic algorithm family.

standard.title: Standards
standard.description: List of standards defining or relating to the algorithm family.

items.title: Standard Reference
items.description: Reference to a standard, including its name and URL.

name.title: Standard Name
name.description: The name or identifier of the standard.

url.title: Standard URL
url.description: A URL pointing to the standard's official documentation.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: Defines the pattern used to construct the complete algorithm name. Placeholders are defined by {} for algorithm-specific properties.

primitive.title: Primitive
primitive.description: Type of cryptographic primitive (e.g., signature, encryption, hash).
